room_title: Escape room "Red Beard's Revenge" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: My family and I played today for my birthday and had a blast. The walker talkies they used are different than the games I have played before but make it interesting. I would definitely recommend them to anyone wanting to play a game. All the employees were nice. We even got to sign the wall when we escaped

room_title: Escape room "Red Beard's Revenge" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: Break Out is now on my list of favorite tourist events of all time. I'd 120% recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Red Beard's Revenge" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
review: We had a group of 9 people and did Redbeard's Revenge. What a blast! Staff was super cool and gave us a discount code for our next visit! Can't wait to come back and do the other rooms!
